name: WHO AM I? (Zeitdokument)
description: It's a visual poem. I wrote this poem, when I was 10. It was a hard time for me and my familiy. The political situation in my country changed, my parents lost  their jobs and we all needed to find a new way to live under different circumstances. Sometimes I think, we still struggling...  I made  WHO AM I? for the Secret Santa Jam 2021 with the instructions and ideas my giftee gave me and with the help of many Partizipients on Discord. Thank You! Was a great Time! See u:)
